text: Ezɨ ia kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Gumazitam uan amebam ko afeziamɨn akurvaghsɨ dagɨaba atɨgha, egha ua gɨn aningɨn akuraghan aghuagha, kamaghɨn aning mɨgei, “Kɨ guan akuraghasa atɨzir dagɨaba, gua markɨ. Kɨ da isɨ God danɨngam.” ’ A kamaghɨn mɨkɨmɨva, amebam ko afeziam gɨnɨghnɨgh deragh aningɨn akurvaghan kogham.
